name: css-to-go
description: A bit of global CSS to help shape up the looks of a plain HTML document.  Has a dark mode and a light mode.
author: P.Envall <petter.envall@gmail.com>

scripts.build: cp example/_astro/*.css dist/css-to-go.min.css && npx prettier example/_astro/*.css > dist/css-to-go.css
scripts.prebuild: npm run build:example && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist
